pullrequest.title: Model Submission for Marble HD2 sensor configuration 1

content.raw:
We are migrating this repository to github on April 10th due to [Bitbucket's forthcoming termination of Mercurial]( https://bitbucket.org/blog/sunsetting-mercurial-support-in-bitbucket). We need to close all open pull requests in order to cleanly move this repository to github.

Could you please target this pull request to the [model_pr_427 branch](#!/osrf/subt/branch/model_pr_427)? 

We will merge this pull request on April 8th to the `model_pr_427` branch, complete the migration to github by April 10th, and open a new pull request for this model.

Thank you for the submission and help with our migration.
content.html:
We are migrating this repository to github on April 10th due to Bitbucket's forthcoming termination of Mercurial. We need to close all open pull requests in order to cleanly move this repository to github.

Could you please target this pull request to the model_pr_427 branch?

We will merge this pull request on April 8th to the model_pr_427 branch, complete the migration to github by April 10th, and open a new pull request for this model.

Thank you for the submission and help with our migration.
